And I<S>2504</S>, brethren<S>80</S>, when I came<S>2064</S> to<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S>, came<S>2064</S> not<S>3756</S> with<S>2596</S> excellency<S>5247</S> of speech<S>3056</S> or<S>2228</S> of wisdom<S>4678</S>, declaring<S>2605</S> unto you<S>5213</S> the testimony<S>3142</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
For<S>1063</S> I determined<S>2919</S> not<S>3756</S> to know<S>1492</S> any thing<S>5100</S> among<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S>, save<S>1508</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, and<S>2532</S> him<S>5126</S> crucified<S>4717</S>.
And<S>2532</S> I<S>1473</S> was<S>1096</S> with<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S> in<S>1722</S> weakness<S>769</S>, and<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> fear<S>5401</S>, and<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> much<S>4183</S> trembling<S>5156</S>.
And<S>2532</S> my<S>3450</S> speech<S>3056</S> and<S>2532</S> my<S>3450</S> preaching<S>2782</S> was not<S>3756</S> with<S>1722</S> enticing<S>3981</S> words<S>3056</S> of man's<S>442</S> wisdom<S>4678</S>, but<S>235</S> in<S>1722</S> demonstration<S>585</S> of the Spirit<S>4151</S> and<S>2532</S> of power<S>1411</S>: <sup>enticing: or, persuasible</sup>
That<S>2443</S> your<S>5216</S> faith<S>4102</S> should<S>5600</S> not<S>3361</S> stand<S>5600</S> in<S>1722</S> the wisdom<S>4678</S> of men<S>444</S>, but<S>235</S> in<S>1722</S> the power<S>1411</S> of God<S>2316</S>. <sup>stand: Gr. be</sup>
Howbeit<S>1161</S> we speak<S>2980</S> wisdom<S>4678</S> among<S>1722</S> them that are perfect<S>5046</S>: yet<S>1161</S> not<S>3756</S> the wisdom<S>4678</S> of this<S>5127</S> world<S>165</S>, nor<S>3761</S> of the princes<S>758</S> of this<S>5127</S> world<S>165</S>, that come to nought<S>2673</S>:
But<S>235</S> we speak<S>2980</S> the wisdom<S>4678</S> of God<S>2316</S> in<S>1722</S> a mystery<S>3466</S>, even the hidden<S>613</S> wisdom, which<S>3739</S> God<S>2316</S> ordained<S>4309</S> before<S>4253</S> the world<S>165</S> unto<S>1519</S> our<S>2257</S> glory<S>1391</S>:
Which<S>3739</S> none<S>3762</S> of the princes<S>758</S> of this<S>5127</S> world<S>165</S> knew<S>1097</S>: for<S>1487</S> <S>1063</S> had they known<S>1097</S> it, they<S>302</S> would<S>4717</S> not<S>3756</S> have crucified<S>4717</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> of glory<S>1391</S>.
But<S>235</S> as<S>2531</S> it is written<S>1125</S>,<S>3739</S> Eye<S>3788</S> hath<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> seen<S>1492</S>, nor<S>2532</S> <S>3756</S> ear<S>3775</S> heard<S>191</S>, neither<S>2532</S> <S>3756</S> have entered<S>305</S> into<S>1909</S> the heart<S>2588</S> of man<S>444</S>, the things which<S>3739</S> God<S>2316</S> hath prepared<S>2090</S> for them that love<S>25</S> him<S>846</S>.
But<S>1161</S> God<S>2316</S> hath revealed<S>601</S> them unto us<S>2254</S> by<S>1223</S> his<S>846</S> Spirit<S>4151</S>: for<S>1063</S> the Spirit<S>4151</S> searcheth<S>2045</S> all things<S>3956</S>, yea<S>2532</S>, the deep things<S>899</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
For<S>1063</S> what<S>5101</S> man<S>444</S> knoweth<S>1492</S> the things<S>3588</S> of a man<S>444</S>, save<S>1508</S> the spirit<S>4151</S> of man<S>444</S> which<S>3588</S> is in<S>1722</S> him<S>846</S>? even<S>2532</S> so<S>3779</S> the things<S>3588</S> of God<S>2316</S> knoweth<S>1492</S> no man<S>3762</S>, but<S>1508</S> the Spirit<S>4151</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> we<S>2249</S> have received<S>2983</S>, not<S>3756</S> the spirit<S>4151</S> of the world<S>2889</S>, but<S>235</S> the spirit<S>4151</S> which<S>3588</S> is of<S>1537</S> God<S>2316</S>; that<S>2443</S> we might know<S>1492</S> the things that are freely given<S>5483</S> to us<S>2254</S> of<S>5259</S> God<S>2316</S>.
Which things<S>3739</S> also<S>2532</S> we speak<S>2980</S>, not<S>3756</S> in<S>1722</S> the words<S>3056</S> which man's<S>442</S> wisdom<S>4678</S> teacheth<S>1318</S>, but<S>235</S> which the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S> teacheth<S>1722</S> <S>1318</S>; comparing<S>4793</S> spiritual things<S>4152</S> with spiritual<S>4152</S>.
But<S>1161</S> the natural<S>5591</S> man<S>444</S> receiveth<S>1209</S> not<S>3756</S> the things<S>3588</S> of the Spirit<S>4151</S> of God<S>2316</S>: for<S>1063</S> they are<S>2076</S> foolishness<S>3472</S> unto him<S>846</S>: neither<S>2532</S> <S>3756</S> can<S>1410</S> he know<S>1097</S> them, because<S>3754</S> they are spiritually<S>4153</S> discerned<S>350</S>.
But<S>1161</S> he that is spiritual<S>4152</S> judgeth<S>350</S> <S>3303</S> all things<S>3956</S>, yet<S>1161</S> he himself<S>846</S> is judged<S>350</S> of<S>5259</S> no man<S>3762</S>. <sup>judgeth: or, discerneth</sup> <sup>judged: or, discerned</sup>
For<S>1063</S> who<S>5101</S> hath known<S>1097</S> the mind<S>3563</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S>, that<S>3739</S> he may instruct<S>4822</S> him<S>846</S>? But<S>1161</S> we<S>2249</S> have<S>2192</S> the mind<S>3563</S> of Christ<S>5547</S>. <sup>may: Gr. shall</sup>
